'''Saurian-Hunting Black Arrow...''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to destroy the [[Goldflame Qucusaur Tyrant]]'s Elemental shield while it is in the "Goldflame" state to make it fall out of the sky.
